'''Bedrock Editor v0.8.2''' is a minor beta release for the [[Bedrock Editor]] released on December 4, 2024.<ref>https://github.com/Mojang/minecraft-editor/discussions/212</ref><ref>https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/32412964700813-Minecraft-Beta-Preview-1-21-60-23</ref>

== Changes ==
* Updated daylight cycle and multiplayer options to now be respected in an exported world.
* Updated [[Bedrock Dedicated Server]] to correctly load an existing Editor project regardless if the {{cd|Editor{{=}}true}} command line argument is used.
* Updated Fly Speed Multiplier Global Hotkeys.
** {{keys|Q}}, {{keys|E}}, {{keys|Shift + Q}} and {{keys|Shift + E}} have been added as viewport keyboard shortcuts for increasing and decreasing fly speed.
* Updated {{cmd|reload}} (and the Reload Scripts action bar item) to now work in the editor when hosting a session, or connected to a remote session (when only a single player is connected).
